item.description:
At this meetup we will learn how to critique photographs.

The following questions will be applied and discussed:
•       What is the center of interest in the photo?
•       Are there dead parts in the photo?

•       Is the depth of field applied properly?
•       Is the subject in focus?
•       Is the photo exposed properly?

•       What do you see: Is there a story/statement/emotion in the photo?

Hunt's Photo will offer a free 8x10 print to everyone who attends this meeting. The digital image needs to be in JPEG format and submitted upon arrival so they can print the image for the meetup.

After the meetup, we will select three photos that will be framed and displayed at Hunt's for one month.

You don't need to bring a photograph to attend this meetup, however, I would encourage you to participate in the review, get a free quality 8x10 print, and enter to have it selected for prominent display.


A donation of $5.00 is suggested for this BPP meetup.
item.why: Our March's meetup will be at Hunt's Photo meeting room (100 Main Street, Melrose, MA 02176) on March 12, 2011 from 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM.
item.name: Photo Critique Meetup
